+//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//

+
+/// A `Variable` augments a `Tensor` with the ability to interact in our
+/// autograd machinery. `Variable` inherits from `Tensor` and may be converted
+/// to and from `Tensor` implicitly.
+class Variable : public at::Tensor {
body: Why make it a `class` if it worked fine as `struct`, and was mentioned like this in so many places? `Function` is still a struct, so it will only be inconsistent.
body_html: Why make it a class if it worked fine as struct, and was mentioned like this in so many places? Function is still a struct, so it will only be inconsistent.
